post-total.title: Posterior Total Methane Emissions
post-total.description: Estimated total methane emissions per grid cell informed by GOSAT satellite total column methane data.

prior-total.title: Prior Total Methane Emissions
prior-total.description: Total methane emissions per grid cell estimated by various inventories or models, excluding satellite based observations from GOSAT.

post-wetland-uncertainty.title: Uncertainty - Wetland Posterior Methane Emissions
post-wetland-uncertainty.description: Uncertainty in estimated methane emissions per grid cell from wetlands informed by GOSAT satellite total column methane data.

post-wetland.title: Wetland Posterior Methane Emissions
post-wetland.description: Estimated methane emissions per grid cell from wetlands informed by GOSAT satellite total column methane data.

prior-wetland-uncertainty.title: Uncertainty - Wetland Prior Methane Emissions
prior-wetland-uncertainty.description: Uncertainty in methane emissions per grid cell from wetlands estimated by various inventories or models, excluding satellite based observations from GOSAT.

prior-wetland.title: Wetland Prior Methane Emissions
prior-wetland.description: Methane emissions per grid cell from wetlands estimated by various inventories or models, excluding satellite based observations from GOSAT.
